message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SP, cs.NA, cs.DS, cs.SI

Reasoning: The paper discusses the application of the Chinese remainder theorem in signal processing, specifically in multidimensional signal processing. This suggests that the paper may belong to the Information Theory (cs.IT), Signal Processing (cs.SP), or Numerical Analysis (cs.NA) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper involves the reconstruction of integer vectors, which could fall under the Discrete Mathematics (cs.DS) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses robustness in the reconstruction process, which could be relevant to the Statistical Learning (cs.SI) sub-category.
